title: Pot-roasted partridge with sage
ingredients: ['4 partridges', '15 g (1/2 oz) fresh sage', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '15 g (1/2 oz) butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tbsp plain flour', '300 ml (10 fl oz) dry cider', '150 ml (5 fl oz) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '2 tsp German mustard', '3 pickled walnuts, about 45 g (1 1/2 oz) in total, thinly sliced', '1 red-skinned dessert apple, cored and cut into thick slices', 'salt and pepper']
